author: cnbc.com
title: Performant Financial: 1Q Earnings Snapshot
text:
LIVERMORE, Calif. (AP) _ Performant Financial Corp. (PFMT) on Tuesday reported first-quarter net income of $8.5 million, after reporting a loss in the same period a year earlier.
On a per-share basis, the Livermore, California-based company said it had profit of 16 cents. Losses, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, came to 8 cents per share.
The provider of audit and recovery services posted revenue of $57 million in the period.
The company's shares closed at $2.79. A year ago, they were trading at $2.25.
